title: Teacher Training Program for Behavior Management Using Virtual Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: VR simulation tools in BYOD environments with formative assessment-driven real-time feedback

learning_goals: Learners can identify and classify various student behavior types (distractibility, aggression, etc.) with 85% accuracy in a simulation environment.
Learners can implement and apply situational behavior intervention strategies (positive reinforcement, nonverbal intervention) at least three times in a virtual classroom.
Learners can improve behavioral management skill mastery by 20% through simulation-based formative assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
